Text:
Hey Anacondaz, what's the secret to the crack?
Thanks for your great torrents.
Just to let you know, I installed it and I ended up reinstalling windows cause something got in and screwed things all up.

amishbuggy116 It is cause you are a noob and dont know shit.This torrent works perfectly.you just need to install it , put the crack in the "bin" folder in the install directory and the mocha.lic file in the C/D:\ProgramData\Imagineer Systems Ltd\Licensing.And thats it!!

This works great, though instructions are not easy to understand.  

copy bsc.dll from crack and overwrite original

The 'mocha lic' file goes in "C:\ProgramData\Imagineer Systems Ltd\Licensing", which is not quite clearly stated in the instructions.

This program creates no problems at all on my Win 7 64 system.  

You're welcome.
Can you make a x32 version please?

I downloaded the files and installed them but i can't find the "C:\ProgramData\Imagineer Systems Ltd\Licensing" to put the 'mocha lic' file in.
Can any body help me?
On windows 7: go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Imagineer Systems Ltd\mocha Pro V2\bin

I hate to admit it but I guess I am a Noob.  I don't normally mess with software but could use this program.
I downloaded this and installed it.  How do I locate the bsc.dll (database file???) and what am I copying to replace what> This is a tad confusing.  And if you are bothered that I asked, please go help someone else.  We have to start somewhere.
Follow LikUranus' directions.  Change folder options to show hidden folders if you're having trouble finding them.

Copy mocha.lic to:

Windows XP
C:Documents and SettingsAll UsersApplication DataImagineer Systems LtdLicensing

Windows 7:
C:/ProgramData/Imagineer Systems Ltd/Licensing

(Create this directory if necessary)
